text: The Italy women's national under-23 volleyball team represents Italy in international women's volleyball competitions and friendly matches under age 23 and it is ruled by the Italian Volleyball Federation That is an affiliate of Federation of International Volleyball FIVB and also a part of European Volleyball Confederation CEV. ==Results== ===FIVB U23 World Championship=== Champions Runners up Third place Fourth place {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|FIVB U23 World Championship Championship Information |- !Year !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! !Squad |- | 2013 | | 6th place | | | | | | Squad |- | 2015 | | 6th place | | | | | | Squad |- bgcolor="efefef" | 2017 | colspan="9"| Withdrew |- !Total!!0 Titles!!2/3!!!!!!!!!!!! |} ==Team== ===Current Squad=== The following is the Italian roster in the 2015 FIVB Volleyball Women's U23 World Championship. Head Coach: Luca Cristofani {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center;" |- !No. !style="width:12em"|Name !style="width:8em"|Date of birth !style="width:11em"|Height !style="width:11em"|Weight !style="width:11em"|Spike !style="width:11em"|Block !style="width:19em"|2015 club |- | ||align=left|Alice Degradi||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Yamamay Busto Arsizio |- | ||align=left|Carlotta Cambi||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Bakery Piacenza |- | ||align=left|Francesca Bosio||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Igor Gorgonzola Novara |- | ||align=left|Sofia D'Odorico ()||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Club Italia |- | ||align=left|Sara Bonifacio||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Igor Volley Novara |- | 10 ||align=left|Giulia Angelina||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Yamamay Busto Arsizio |- | 11 ||align=left|Anna Danesi||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Club Italia |- | 12 ||align=left|Anastasia Guerra||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Club Italia |- | 13 ||align=left|Chiara De Bortoli||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Volley Pool Piave San Donà |- | 15 ||align=left|Beatrice Berti||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Club Italia |- | 16 ||align=left|Anna Nicoletti||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Club Italia |- | 18 ||align=left|Elisa Zanette||align=right|||||||||||align=left| Igor Gorgonzola Novara |} ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:National women's under-23 volleyball teams Volleyball Category:Volleyball in Italy Category:Women's volleyball in Italy
